content: Sure, I can help you with that. The best time to visit Machu Picchu is during the dry season, which runs from May to October. During these months, there's little to no rain, and the skies are typically clear, allowing for stunning views of the ancient ruins and surrounding mountains. The busiest months are June to August, so if you want to avoid crowds, it's best to plan your trip for May, September, or October. However, keep in mind that Machu Picchu is a popular destination year-round, so it's always best to plan ahead and book your tickets and accommodations in advance.
